summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 48E, Page 125, of the official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 6 of V.R. Niesz and Ada B. Niesz Addition to West Seattle, and in the adjacent alley and vacated alley, from Single Family Residence High Density (RS 5000) zone to Community Business (BC) Zone, contingent upon the recording of a properly executed, delivered and accepted Property Use and Development Agreement (Petition of Safeway Stores, Inc., CF 285013).
